segments.text: What do you think of the play showed last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think there's too much violence and it did no good to my little boy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I turned it off when the fight got heated in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really hard to avoid such bad influence anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
